title: My League of Legends won't save my ingame settings

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
My League of Legends won't save my ingame settings every time i start a new game it look like the picture?
but I just edit it in the settings all the time..
but now its annoying! I want to fix it now! help me plz^^

replies.body: So I can get a better understanding to help out, what settings are you trying to save?  As an aside, per your screenshot it looks like you're also having some graphical issues (mini map).  Let me know if this is case, and I'm happy to dig into this with you.

Its actually The Problem Witth the client Not opening Full screen
I had to set it to borderless
